price: Wakasema: Mleteni mbele ya macho ya watu, wapate kumshuhudia
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ
footnotes: Wakasema wakubwa wao: Nendeni mkamlete, ahukumiwe mbele ya macho ya watu, na washuhudie aliyo yatenda!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
